stem: You are considering deploying a solution using containers on Google Cloud. What Google Cloud solutions are available to you that will provide a managed compute platform with native support for containers?
options/0/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.
options/1/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.
options/2/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.

stem: You are ready to start work building an application in Google Cloud. What IAM hierarchy should you implement for this project?
options/0/title: Create a new organization for the project and create all projects and resources inside the new organization.
options/0/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.
options/1/title: Create new projects for each of the component applications and create folders inside those for the resources.
options/1/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.
options/2/title: Create new projects and resources inside departmental folders for the resources needed by the component applications.
options/2/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.
options/3/title: Create a new folder inside your organization and create projects inside that folder for the resources.

stem: One of the key characteristics of cloud computing is the concept of measured service. What is the primary customer benefit of the measured service aspect of cloud computing?
options/0/title: You share resources from a large pool enabling economies of scale.
options/0/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.
options/1/title: You can get more resources as quickly as you need them.
options/1/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.
options/2/rationale: Review the lesson on Cloud Computing and Google Cloud.
options/3/title: You pay only for the resources you consume.

stem: You are developing a new product for a customer and need to implement control structures in Google Cloud to help manage the Google Cloud resources consumed by the product and the billing for the customer account. What steps should you take to manage costs for this product and customer?
options/0/title: Set up budgets and alerts at the project level for the product.
options/1/title: Configure the billing account for each project associated with the product.
options/1/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.
options/2/title: Configure quotas and limits for the product folders.
options/2/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.
options/3/title: Configure the billing account at the product folder level in the resource hierarchy.
options/3/rationale: Review the lesson on Resource Management.

stem: You need to write some automated scripts to run periodic updates to the resources in your Google Cloud environment. What tools can you install in your own computers to allow you to run those scripts?
options/0/rationale: Review the lesson on Interacting with Google Cloud.
options/1/rationale: Review the lesson on Interacting with Google Cloud.
options/2/rationale: Review the lesson on Interacting with Google Cloud.
